title: My 1k win
body: {{champion:157}}  Hey, i was just wondering if anyone from Riot would be wanting to play in my 1000th win with me? I thought it would be an awesome way to celebrate it! I'm currently at 994 wins!

replies.body: stfu riot dont want to play with u , twelvie level 12 deceitful shitstain trash, gtfo u twelvie, noob go die lol gg rekt
This is my second account,, search for TriHardHero, my main which I had them swapped because I wanted my main to be called TriHardHero and my other  to be MCbuildaz
